title: Worse Than Watergate | Guests: Matt Schlapp & Dave Isay | 2/14/22
description:
Glenn discusses Hilary Clinton and the confirmation that her campaign was spying on Donald Trump’s campaign. Glenn explores the federal manipulation of the stock market. Spokesman for the Freedom Trucker Convoy BJ Dichter joins Glenn to give the latest updates on the Canadian convoy and the media manipulation coming from the Canadian government. Glenn and Pat break down President Biden and the latest on ESG scores. Chairman of the American Conservative Union Matt Schlapp joins to discuss his new book, “The Desecrators: Defeating the Cancel Culture Mob and Reclaiming One Nation Under God.” StoryCorps founder Dave Isay joins to share some of his stories of Valentine's Day.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
